definition: to work high above the ground

sentences.english: Yost was an engineer involved in the development of high-altitude weather balloons.
sentences.chinese: 約斯特是一名工程師參與制訂高空氣象氣球。

sentences.english: On high the great white clouds slid swiftly.
sentences.chinese: 大片大片的白雲在高空飄過。

sentences.english: Currents of warm air keep the hang-gliders aloft.
sentences.chinese: 懸掛式滑翔機藉着暖氣流在高空飛行。

sentences.english: NASA research satellites or long-duration high-altitude flights might also help.
sentences.chinese: NASA的研究衛星或長期的高空飛行也可以幫上忙。

sentences.english: Can Bear hardships and hard work, healthly and strong, could adapt aloft operation outdoors.
sentences.chinese: 喫苦耐勞，身體健碩，適應戶外高空操作設備。

sentences.english: Objective: To investigate the effect of high altitude environment condition on the antioxidation of water extracts fromCelosia cristata L.
sentences.chinese: 探討高空環境條件對雞冠花抗氧化功能的影響。

sentences.english: The reduced wind shear means that upper-level winds are less likely to disrupt hurricane formation.
sentences.chinese: 減弱風切變意味着高空風不太可能影響颶風的形成。

sentences.english: It is widely used for aerial work platform lifting equipment.
sentences.chinese: 是用途廣泛的高空作業臺升降設備。

sentences.english: In addition to the enormous damage a HANE would cause, there is the question of response.
sentences.chinese: 除了高空核爆造成的重大損害，如何迴應也是個問題。

sentences.english: And in the sky above, her starry backdrop.
sentences.chinese: 我看見了高空星光點綴的天幕。

sentences.english: This procedure deals with working at heights and rope access.
sentences.chinese: 本程序主要講述高空作業和繩索的使用。

sentences.english: A contrail is the visible vapor trail behind airplanes or rockets traveling at high altitudes.
sentences.chinese: 這團痕跡可能是飛機或火箭飛上高空後留下的航跡雲。

sentences.english: India has no facilities for altitude-testing and flight-testing jet engines.
sentences.chinese: 印度尚沒有進行高空測試與飛行測試的設施。

sentences.english: They said they would disturb the gods that dwelt in the upper air.
sentences.chinese: 他們說飛機會攪擾住在高空的神靈。

sentences.english: The plane flew at an altitude of 30,000 feet.
sentences.chinese: 這架飛機在三萬英尺的高空飛行。

sentences.english: The eagle spirals up into the sky.

definition: to dive down fast/to swoop down
to rise to the sky/to lift off/to levitate/liftoff
to rise/to ascend/to climb (airplane etc)/to go up (sales figures etc)/to gain promotion
to spiral/to circle/to go around/to hover/to orbit
